metadata.title: CVE-2019-15141 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: WriteTIFFImage in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16 allowsattackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash resulting from aheap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted TIFF image file, related toTIFFRewriteDirectory, TIFFWriteDirectory, TIFFWriteDirectorySec, andTIFFWriteDirectoryTagColormap in tif_dirwrite.c of LibTIFF. NOTE: thisoccurs because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-11597.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
